mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT * FROM t_chat WHERE send_time IN (SELECT MAX(send_time) FROM t_chat WHERE recipient_username = #{useername} OR sender_username = #{useername} GROUP BY CONCAT( IF(sender_username > recipient_username, sender_username, recipient_username), IF(sender_username < recipient_username, sender_username, recipient_username) )) AND (recipient_username = #{useername} OR sender_username = #{useername})) c ORDER BY c.send_time DESC;
mapper.insert: insert into t_chat(sender_username, recipient_username, content, send_time, type, is_read) values (#{senderUsername}, #{recipientUsername}, #{content}, #{sendTime}, #{type}, #{isRead})
